Tau slice, H->tautau sample, pu46, run1 TauSlice, H->tautau sample, pu46 EventMax=4000; TrigInDetValidation/TrigInDetValidation_RTT_topOptions_TauSlice Trigger/TrigValidation/TrigInDetValidation TrigInDetValidation long

exeName TIDArdict.exe
exeParamString TIDAdata11-rtt.dat -f data-tau.root -b Test_bin.dat
